metadata.title: Hanes Women's Constant Comfort Microfiber Boyshort 3-Pack Panty
features: X-Temp technology is designed to adapt to your temperature and activity to keep you cool and dry for all day comfort.
Just enough spandex for move-with-you all day comfort
Soft, narrow waistband and ultra sleek fabric eliminates panty lines for a seamless look under clothes
No ride up leg bands stay in place for all day comfort-guaranteed
description: These microfiber boy short panties you'll keep your cool no matter what the day brings. Available in a convenient 3-pack.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 1 Pounds", "Item model number": "MI47P3", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "May 19, 2017", "Manufacturer": "Hanes"}
